verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him בְּהַעֲלֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> unto him When thou lightest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּרֹ֔ת <S%H5216><s%> the lamps אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מוּל֙ <S%H4136><s%> against פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the front הַמְּנוֹרָ֔ה <S%H4501><s%> the candlestick יָאִ֖ירוּ <S%H215><s%> shall give light שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> the seven הַנֵּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5216><s%> lamps

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מוּל֙ <S%H4136><s%> against פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the front הַמְּנוֹרָ֔ה <S%H4501><s%> the candlestick הֶעֱלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> so he lighted נֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5216><s%> the lamps כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וְזֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> now this מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> And this work הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <S%H4501><s%> of the candlestick מִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H4749><s%> [was of] beaten זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> gold עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יְרֵכָ֥הּ <S%H3409><s%> unto the shaft עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to its פִּרְחָ֖הּ <S%H6525><s%> thereof unto the flowers מִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H4749><s%> thereof [was] beaten work הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he כַּמַּרְאֶ֗ה <S%H4758><s%> according unto the pattern אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> had shewed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> so he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃ <S%H4501><s%> the candlestick פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַ֚ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְטִהַרְתָּ֖ <S%H2891><s%> and cleanse אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְכֹֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> And thus shalt thou do לָהֶם֙ לְטַֽהֲרָ֔ם <S%H2891><s%> unto them to cleanse הַזֵּ֥ה <S%H5137><s%> them Sprinkle עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> water חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> of purifying וְהֶעֱבִ֤ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> use תַ֙עַר֙ <S%H8593><s%> A razor עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> their whole בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> all their flesh וְכִבְּס֥וּ <S%H3526><s%> and let them wash בִגְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H899><s%> their clothes וְהִטֶּהָֽרוּ׃ <S%H2891><s%> and [so] make themselves clean

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> Then let them take פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> bull וּמִנְחָת֔וֹ <S%H4503><s%> with his meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> [even] fine flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וּפַר־ <S%H6499><s%> bullock שֵׁנִ֥י <S%H8145><s%> and another בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bull תִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> shalt thou take לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהִ֨קְהַלְתָּ֔ <S%H6950><s%> together אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole עֲדַ֖ת <S%H5712><s%> the whole assembly בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְסָמְכ֧וּ <S%H5564><s%> shall put בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> upon the Levites

וְהֵנִיף֩ <S%H5130><s%> shall offer אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֤ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites תְּנוּפָה֙ <S%H8573><s%> [for] an offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהָי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> may qualify לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> that they may execute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> the service יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites יִסְמְכ֣וּ <S%H5564><s%> shall lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the heads הַפָּרִ֑ים <S%H6499><s%> of the bullocks וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> and thou shalt offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> the one חַטָּ֜את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> and the other עֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> for the Levites

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתָּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> And thou shalt set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> and before בָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <S%H5130><s%> and offer אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> them [for] an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהִבְדַּלְתָּ֙ <S%H914><s%> Thus shalt thou separate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֖י הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites

וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And after כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> go in הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> that shall the Levites לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> to do the service אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְטִֽהַרְתָּ֣ <S%H2891><s%> and thou shalt cleanse אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <S%H5130><s%> them and offer אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> תְּנוּפָֽה׃ <S%H8573><s%> them [for] an offering

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for נְתֻנִ֨ים <S%H5414><s%> For they [are] wholly given נְתֻנִ֥ים <S%H5414><s%> given הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לִ֔י מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> unto me from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תַּחַת֩ <S%H8478><s%> instead פִּטְרַ֨ת <S%H6363><s%> instead of such as open כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every רֶ֜חֶם <S%H7358><s%> every womb בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> [even instead of] the firstborn כֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָקַ֥חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> have I taken אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לִֽי׃

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לִ֤י כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> For all the firstborn בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> [are] mine [both] man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and beast בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on the day הַכֹּתִ֤י <S%H5221><s%> that I smote כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> every firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> I sanctified אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לִֽי׃

וָאֶקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> And I have taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every בְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> for all the firstborn בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וָאֶתְּנָ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> And I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites נְתֻנִ֣ים ׀ <S%H5414><s%> [as] a gift לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> to Aaron וּלְבָנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons מִתּוֹךְ֮ <S%H8432><s%> from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲבֹ֞ד <S%H5647><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַ֤ת <S%H5656><s%> the service בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּלְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> and to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become בִּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נֶ֔גֶף <S%H5063><s%> that there be no plague בְּגֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H5066><s%> come nigh בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> unto the sanctuary

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> and all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> to the Levites כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> according unto all that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> Moses לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> concerning the Levites כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> so עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> so did לָהֶ֖ם בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּֽתְחַטְּא֣וּ <S%H2398><s%> were purified הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites וַֽיְכַבְּסוּ֙ <S%H3526><s%> and they washed בִּגְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H899><s%> their clothes וַיָּ֨נֶף <S%H5130><s%> offered אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> them [as] an offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיְכַפֵּ֧ר <S%H3722><s%> made an atonement עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron לְטַהֲרָֽם׃ <S%H2891><s%> for them to cleanse
